{{Han char|rn=64|rad=手|as=16|sn=19|four=56000|canj=QWWV|ids=⿰扌圜}}

# to [[detain]], to [[take]] into [[custody]]
# to [[bind]], to [[tie up]], to [[restrict]]
# [[w:Muzha District|Muzha]] (Mucha), a former [[district]] in [[Taipei]], now part of [[w:Wenshan District|Wenshan]]
